data_table.description: Reproductive History Form, Exam 4. Participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: RHXC1
variable.description: [Reproductive history]. Did the participant have menstrual periods within 2 years prior to her last visit? Q1 [Reproductive History Form, exam 4]

variable.name: RHXC2
variable.description: [Reproductive history]. Have you had any menstrual periods or bleeding during the last 2 years? Q2 [Reproductive History Form, exam 4]

variable.name: RHXC4
variable.description: [Reproductive history]. Was this a natural period, or was it due to The use of hormones, or to some other cause? Q4 [Reproductive History Form, exam 4]

variable.name: RHXC6
variable.description: [Reproductive history]. Have you reached menopause? Q6 [Reproductive History Form, exam 4]

variable.name: RHXC8
variable.description: [Reproductive history]. Was your menopause natural or the result of surgery or radiation? Q8 [Reproductive History Form, exam 4]

variable.name: RHXC9
variable.description: [Reproductive history]. Are you having hot flashes? Q9 [Reproductive History Form, exam 4]

variable.name: RHXC10
variable.description: [Reproductive history]. Since your last ARIC visit on (date) have you taken or used any female hormone pills, skin patches, shots, or implants? Q10 [Reproductive History Form, exam 4]

variable.name: RHXC11A
variable.description: [Reproductive history]. Please give me the names of all female hormones you have used since that exam, starting with any you may be taking currently or with the most recent one. Please exclude hormone creams. Name. Q11A [Reproductive History Form, exam 4]

variable.name: RHXC11B
variable.description: [Reproductive history]. Please give me the names of all female hormones you have used since that exam, starting with any you may be taking currently or with the most recent one. Please exclude hormone creams. Concentration (mg or mcg units). Q11B [Reproductive History Form, exam 4]

variable.name: RHXC12
variable.description: [Reproductive history]. Code 1 Q12 [Reproductive History Form, exam 4]

variable.name: RHXC14
variable.description: [Reproductive history]. Are you currently taking this hormone? Q14 [Reproductive History Form, exam 4]

variable.name: RHXC17A
variable.description: [Reproductive history]. Do (did) you take this hormone by mouth? Q17A [Reproductive History Form, exam 4]

variable.name: RHXC18
variable.description: [Reproductive history]. How did/do you use this hormone? Q18 [Reproductive History Form, exam 4]

variable.name: RHXC20B
variable.description: [Reproductive history]. How often do (did) you receive your shot? Period for shot(S): hormone 1. Q20B [Reproductive History Form, exam 4]

variable.name: RHXC21
variable.description: [Reproductive history]. Where is (was) your implant placed? Q21 [Reproductive History Form, exam 4]

variable.name: RHXC23
variable.description: [Reproductive history]. Have you taken a second female hormone since your last ARIC visit? Q23 [Reproductive History Form, exam 4]

variable.name: RHXC23A
variable.description: [Reproductive history]. Have you taken a second female hormone since your last ARIC visit? Name. Q23A [Reproductive History Form, exam 4]

variable.name: RHXC23B
variable.description: [Reproductive history]. Have you taken a second female hormone since your last ARIC visit? Concentration (mg or mcg units). Q23B [Reproductive History Form, exam 4]

variable.name: RHXC24
variable.description: [Reproductive history]. Code 2. Q24 [Reproductive History Form, exam 4]

variable.name: RHXC26
variable.description: [Reproductive history]. Are you currently taking this hormone? Q26 [Reproductive History Form, exam 4]

variable.name: RHXC29A
variable.description: [Reproductive history]. Do (did) you take this hormone by mouth? Q29A [Reproductive History Form, exam 4]

variable.name: RHXC30
variable.description: [Reproductive history]. How did/do you use this hormone? Q30 [Reproductive History Form, exam 4]

variable.name: RHXC32B
variable.description: [Reproductive history]. Have you taken a second female hormone since your last ARIC visit? Period for shot(S): hormone 2. Q32B [Reproductive History Form, exam 4]

variable.name: RHXC33
variable.description: [Reproductive history]. Where is (was) your implant placed? Q33 [Reproductive History Form, exam 4]

variable.name: RHXC35
variable.description: [Reproductive history]. Did participant have a partial or total hysterectomy or oophorectomy at the time of her last visit? Q35 [Reproductive History Form, exam 4]

variable.name: RHXC36
variable.description: [Reproductive history]. At your last visit on (date), you reported prior surgery to have your uterus or ovaries removed. Have you had additional surgery on your uterus or ovaries? Q26 [Reproductive History Form, exam 4]

variable.name: RHXC37
variable.description: [Reproductive history]. Have you had surgery to have your uterus or ovaries removed? (That is a partial or total hysterectomy or oophorectomy). Q37 [Reproductive History Form, exam 4]

variable.name: RHXC38
variable.description: [Reproductive history]. Has your uterus (womb) been removed? Q38 [Reproductive History Form, exam 4]

variable.name: RHXC40
variable.description: [Reproductive history]. Have you had either one or both ovaries removed? Q40 [Reproductive History Form, exam 4]

variable.name: RHXC5
variable.description: [Reproductive history]. In the past 2 years, how many periods did you miss? Q5 [Reproductive History Form, exam 4]

variable.name: RHXC7
variable.description: [Reproductive history]. At approximately what age did menopause begin? Q7 [Reproductive History Form, exam 4]

variable.name: RHXC13
variable.description: [Reproductive history]. At what age did you start taking this hormone for the first time? Q13 [Reproductive History Form, exam 4]

variable.name: RHXC15
variable.description: [Reproductive history]. At what age did you stop taking this hormone? Q15 [Reproductive History Form, exam 4]

variable.name: RHXC16A
variable.description: [Reproductive history]. For how long altogether since your last ARIC exam have you used this hormone? Years Q16A [Reproductive History Form, exam 4]

variable.name: RHXC16B
variable.description: [Reproductive history]. For how long altogether since your last ARIC exam have you used this hormone? Months Q16B [Reproductive History Form, exam 4]

variable.name: RHXC17B
variable.description: [Reproductive history]. How many days do (did) you take this hormone in a 4 week period? Q17B [Reproductive History Form, exam 4]

variable.name: RHXC17C
variable.description: [Reproductive history]. On a typical day when you take (took) this hormone, how many pills do (did) you take? Q17C [Reproductive History Form, exam 4]

variable.name: RHXC19
variable.description: [Reproductive history]. On a typical day when you have (had) a patch on, how many do (did) you use? Q19 [Reproductive History Form, exam 4]

variable.name: RHXC20A
variable.description: [Reproductive history]. How often do (did) you receive your shot? Number of shot(S): hormone 1. Q20A [Reproductive History Form, exam 4]

variable.name: RHXC22
variable.description: [Reproductive history]. On a typical day when you have (had) your implant in place, how many do (did) you have in place? Q22 [Reproductive History Form, exam 4]

variable.name: RHXC25
variable.description: [Reproductive history]. At what age did you start taking this hormone for the first time? Q25 [Reproductive History Form, exam 4]

variable.name: RHXC27
variable.description: [Reproductive history]. At what age did you stop taking this hormone? Q27 [Reproductive History Form, exam 4]

variable.name: RHXC28A
variable.description: [Reproductive history]. For how long altogether since your last ARIC exam have you used this hormone? Years. Q28A [Reproductive History Form, exam 4]

variable.name: RHXC28B
variable.description: [Reproductive history]. For how long altogether since your last ARIC exam have you used this hormone? Months Q28B [Reproductive History Form, exam 4]

variable.name: RHXC29B
variable.description: [Reproductive history]. How many days do (did) you take this hormone in a 4 week period? Q29B [Reproductive History Form, exam 4]

variable.name: RHXC29C
variable.description: [Reproductive history]. On a typical day when you take (took) this hormone, how many pills do (did) you take? Q29C [Reproductive History Form, exam 4]

variable.name: RHXC31
variable.description: [Reproductive history]. On a typical day when you have (had) a patch on, how many do(did) you use? Q31 [Reproductive History Form, exam 4]

variable.name: RHXC32A
variable.description: [Reproductive history]. How often do (did) you receive your shot? Number of shot(S): hormone 2. Q32A [Reproductive History Form, exam 4]

variable.name: RHXC34
variable.description: [Reproductive history]. On a typical day when you have(had) your implant in place, how many do(did) you have in place? Q34 [Reproductive History Form, exam 4]

variable.name: RHXC39
variable.description: [Reproductive history]. How old were you when this operation was performed? Q39 [Reproductive History Form, exam 4]

variable.name: RHXC41
variable.description: [Reproductive history]. How old were you when this operation was performed? Q41 [Reproductive History Form, exam 4]

variable.name: RHXCFLAG
variable.description: Indicator for presence of form [Reproductive History Form, exam 4]

variable.name: RHXCCY
variable.description: Contact year [10] [Reproductive History Form, exam 4]

variable.name: GWAS_ID
variable.description: ARIC participant ID [Reproductive History Form, exam 4]
